description: Sheet Music is similar to a scroll or magic book but exclusive to bard classes. It allows bards to sing a song they normally couldn’t, making it easier to pull off but with a chance of failure if the performance was out of key. If sung badly it tears a little bit, too many tears and it’s ruined.
name: Sheet Music
rules_text: Sheet Music is a bard tool that helps bards perform songs with a chance of failure if sung out of key.
